chart_description: The `net.carrier` chart displays the physical link state of the network interface. This state indicates whether the interface is up or down. A physical link state of up means the interface is connected and operational, while a state of down means the interface is disconnected or experiencing issues.

dimension_descriptions.down: The number of times the physical link state of the interface has been down.
dimension_descriptions.up: The number of times the physical link state of the interface has been up.
